meanings.definition: Having a large and strong physical build.
meanings.sent1: The burlier man easily lifted the heavy box.
meanings.sent2: The burlier wrestler won the match with his powerful muscles.
meanings.sent3: The burlier dog tried to squeeze into the tiny bed, causing much laughter.
meanings.sent4: His burlier presence in the room made everyone stop and take notice.
meanings.sent5: The burlier oak tree stood tall and sturdy in the forest.

meanings.definition: More large and strong in physical build than someone or something else.
meanings.sent1: The burlier lion scared off the smaller animals in the jungle.
meanings.sent2: She chose the burlier hammer to drive the nail into the wall.
meanings.sent3: The burlier cake towered over the other desserts at the party.
meanings.sent4: His burlier voice boomed across the room, commanding attention.
meanings.sent5: The burlier mountain loomed in the distance, casting a shadow over the valley.
